mainToken.description: Your main account's token, used for redeeming the gift.

guildTokens.description: Your alt accounts tokens. Required if useMain is set to false. (Split multiple tokens with ",")

nitro_webhookUrl.description: Put here your webhook url if you wish to receive messages when a gift is redeemed.

notes_webhookUrl.description: Put here your webhook url if you wish to receive messages when notes are sniped.

useMain.description: Do you want to use your main token for sniping?

legitimacyCheck.description: Does some magic to check if the code could be legitimate but will slow the sniper down

obfuscationCheck.description: Does some magic to remove obfuscation from codes but will slow the sniper down

notesCheck.description: Does some magic to check for privnotes link. Little performance impact. IMPORTANT: This will snipe all privnote links (except your own) and destroy them!

writeNotes.description: Whether you want all sniped notes to be written in the ./notes folder. Doesn't slow the sniper down.

tokenStatus.description: The status of guildTokens: {online, idle, invisible, dnd}

mainStatus.description: The status of your main token: {online, idle, invisible, dnd}. useMain must be set to true or this is useless. This status will be overwritten by other discord clients.

permanentCache.description: Cache usedTokens to disk. No performance impact but will increase the memory used.

webhookping_userid.description: If set will ping the userid in the nitro_webhook (i.e. upon successful sniping).

replit.description: Set to true only if you are running the sniper on repl.it.
